channel.title: The Smashing Machine on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Smashing Machine on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Smashing Machine,’ ‘Hedda,’ ‘The Lost Bus’ Among Zurich Gala Premieres
item.description: Rebecca Zlotowski’s ‘A Private Life’ with Jodie Foster, and Haifaa Al Mansour’s ‘Unidentified’ will also get the gala treatment at the 21st Zurich Festival.

item.title: ‘The Smashing Machine,’ ‘Hedda,’ ‘The Lost Bus’ Among Zurich Gala Premieres
